title: Big Bend National Park: How to apply
body: How to apply       Application - If you are interested in volunteering please fill out this form and send it to: Big Bend National Park Volunteer Program Office PO Box 129 Big Bend National Park, TX 79834 432-477-1196 You can also e-mail us Volunteers are sought for the positions of camphost, visitor center host, and maintenance. Volunteers should be committed to bringing their trailer or RV and staying at least three months. In exchange for a RV site, electricity, water, and reimbursed propane expenses, volunteers are required to work 32 hours a week. Most volunteer positions require training, references, and a background check. Training is provided unless otherwise noted.  Â     Current Volunteer Opportunities
